trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Linq" /> namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.Linq" /> fornisce le classi e le interfacce che supportano query che usano Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq> namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Linq> Ã¨ lo spazio dei nomi nell'assembly System. core (in System.Core.dll).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> classe contiene [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] operatori query standard che operano su oggetti che implementano <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> classe contiene [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] operatori query standard che operano su oggetti che implementano <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.

trans-unit.source: For information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su LINQ to SQL, vedere [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
